name: Scary Sponge Neighbor: Escape
description:
Your task is solve puzzles and escape the horror house before encountering a very scared Sponge Neighbor with a hammer in hand.

But you will have to be very careful, because he has locked you in the house . Sounds easy? 
Would you be able to escape from him without attracting the attention in this horror game?

Now you have to try to get out of house, but be careful and quiet. Be cautious not to attract her attention or make noise to attract it.

you must be very careful if you want to free yourself, your little noise can create the problem for you even if you can die.

features:

- Jump scared, traps are everywhere so be careful.
- Horror and fear are always visible from inside.
- Hide to survive, you must be hurry.
- This jumps care game can take you fears and even your tears sometime.
- Easy to play with Ghost free mode and Neighbor mode
- High quality scary music
- Fearful and tension atmosphere
- Live in the horrific horror stories and feel the scream sounds
- Plug in your headphones for the best
- Cry if you are scared but do not give up, get out of the house with any price.
